name: The Avenue Guest House

reviews.text: I have been to Cardiff a few times and I have stayed at The Avenue three times, one of them for more than a week.
reviews.title: I will certainly go back

reviews.text: The guest house is a five-minute bus ride from the city centre or you can also walk. The rooms are very well-decorated and clean.
reviews.title: Feel as at home.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hosts are very friendly and when we stay there we feel like home.
reviews.title: Outstanding, clean and friendly!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Besides, it is quite value for money, so I would really recommend you to book The Avenue whenever you stay in Cardiff.
reviews.title: One of the nicest stays in the UK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Usually I don´t write reviews but In this case it won´t be fair if I don´t .
reviews.title: What a wonderful place!

reviews.text: Did visit the web site,the pictures are a true reflection of the Avenue.
reviews.title: Home from home

likes.disliked: — teenagers moan about walking so we tended to use car

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Couldn't wish for better hospitality , would have enjoyed the benefit of tea and coffee in rooms, plenty in the kitchen but I enjoy the first cuppa in bed ,pure personal choice.
reviews.title: Clean, friendly guesthouse

reviews.text: With a family member over from Australia, we stopped a night in Cardiff on our whistle-stop tour of the UK.
reviews.title: Brilliant service, clean room, great value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is evident from the presentation of the rooms, the service and the staff that Collette takes a special pride in her work. Thank you so much for the wonderful travel and sightseeing advice you gave us.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay!

reviews.text: The Avenue has wonderful clean facilities. We had a twin room (Room 2) with a shared bathroom. Everything was clean, tidy and well kept. The bathroom was spotless and the beds comfortable. Thankfully there were towels and basic bathing good provided as we were at the end of ours! We booked without hassle online, were greeted (and expected) and taken to our room. Collette provided us with a decent breakfast and coffee a-plenty as required.
reviews.title: Great location, wonderful hospitality, pretty rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks once again. We will be back!
reviews.title: Beautiful House in Wonderful Street

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the Avenue Guest House for one night while visiting Cardiff, and we'd definitely recommend it.
reviews.title: Very nice but room for improvement

aka: The Avenue Guest House Cardiff, Wales
description: Welcome to the Avenue Guest House, a family home where we would like you to feel home from home. A stunning Victorian town house situated along a very pretty tree lined street with cafes, restaurants and pubs within minutes walk, however if you are looking for a more lively atmosphere, the city centre is just 5 minutes away and hosts a variety of amenities including bars, nightclubs, restaurants, cinemas and theatres. Not forgetting the Millennium Stadium.
